title: Xen Nhà: Visiting Rites: I Take Off My Shoes Before I Enter (Unheard Relations)
itunes:author: Liquid Architecture
itunes:subtitle: Unheard Relations
itunes:summary:
As part of the exhibition Site & Sound: Sonic art as ecological practice at McClelland Sculpture Park and Gallery, Liquid Architecture was invited to stage a project critically responding to themes of sonic art, acoustic ecology, field recording, deep listening, and spatial sound, all understood in the context of profound environmental crisis and instability.

Exploring resonance and grief around language Xen's piece Visiting Rights untangles how language can create connections across multiple places.
